languages.text: "На офицерской палубе произошел инцидент — сервиторы вышли из строя и напали на людей".

traits.locale_text: "На офицерской палубе произошел инцидент — дикий зверь разгуливал по коридорам, нападая на людей".

languages.text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."
languages.original_text: "На офицерской палубе произошел инцидент — сервиторы вышли из строя и напали на людей".

traits.locale_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: a wild beast was roaming free and attacking anyone it ran into."
"An incident took place on the officers' deck: a wild beast was roaming free and attacking anyone it ran into."
"An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."
"An incident took place on the officers' deck: a wild beast was roaming free and attacking anyone it ran into."
"An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

languages.text: “军官甲板上之前发生了事故。一群机仆失控了，袭击了船员。”
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: “军官甲板上之前发生了事故。一头野兽在四处游荡，袭击遇到的每个人。”

languages.text: «Se ha producido un incidente en la cubierta de oficiales: unos servidores han enloquecido y atacado a la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha producido un incidente en la cubierta de oficiales: una bestia salvaje andaba suelta, atacando a cualquiera con el que se cruzara».

languages.text: 「士官デッキで事件が起こりました。何人かのサーヴィターが暴れてクルーを襲った模様です」
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「士官デッキで事件が起こりました。野生の獣が自由に歩き回り、手あたり次第人を攻撃していました」
「士官デッキで事件が起こりました。何人かのサーヴィターが暴れてクルーを襲った模様です」

languages.text: « Il y a eu un incident sur le pont des officiers : des servitors devenus fous s'en sont pris à l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a eu un incident sur le pont des officiers : une bête sauvage en liberté s'attaquait à tous ceux qu'elle rencontrait. »

languages.text: "Auf dem Offiziersdeck gab es einen Zwischenfall: Einige Servitoren haben die Crew attackiert."
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Auf dem Offiziersdeck hat es einen Vorfall gegeben: Eine wilde Bestie lief frei herum und griff jeden an, dem sie begegnete."

languages.text: "Subay güvertesinde bir hadise meydana geldi: Birkaç hizmetör çıldırıp mürettebata saldırdı."
languages.original_text: "An incident took place on the officers' deck: some servitors went berserk and attacked the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Subay güvertesinde bir hadise meydana geldi: Birkaç servitör çıldırıp mürettebata saldırdı."
